summary: New characters: Praskovya Pavlovna, Rodion Raskolnikov, Alyona Ivanovna, Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin, Porfiry Petrovich. New connections: Praskovya-Rodion (landlord-tenant), Alyona-Rodion (acquaintance), Dmitri-Porfiry (conflict).
summary_short: Introduces Praskovya Pavlovna, Rodion Raskolnikov, Alyona Ivanovna, Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin, and 1 others. Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (2 ties). Key relationship types: acquaintance, conflict, landlord-tenant.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (2), Praskovya Pavlovna (1), Alyona Ivanovna (1), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (1)
New characters: Praskovya, Rodion, Alyona, Dmitri, Porfiry
story_summary: On a hot July evening, a young man named Raskolnikov leaves his cramped garret in St. Petersburg, feeling anxious and ashamed due to his debts to his landlady. He reflects on his isolation and fears while navigating the streets, overwhelmed by the heat and the stench of the city. Eventually, he arrives at the home of an old pawnbroker, Alyona Ivanovna, to pawn a watch, hoping to receive a small sum of money.
